text_en: Large fonts make it easier to read.
text_sw: Maandishi makubwa hufanya usomaji kuwa rahisi.

text_en: The screen magnifier makes books with small fonts possible to read and understand.
text_sw: Kikuza skrini huvifanya vitabu vyenye maandishi madogo kuwa rahisi kusomeka na kueleweka.

text_en: When reading with large fonts people with visual impairment use less time.
text_sw: Maandishi makubwa huwarahisishia usomaji watu wenye matatizo ya uoni hivyo kutumia muda mfupi zaidi.

text_en: A challenge with the screen magnifier is that when many people want to use it, they have to wait for each other to finish.
text_sw: Changamoto ya kutumia kikuza skrini ni kwamba watu wengi wanapotaka kukitumia, wanapaswa kusubiriana mmoja mmoja.
